summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 9, 2019. It documents inmate population counts by housing unit and includes official count slips signed by staff, providing a snapshot of the facility's census on that date.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, documenting counts by housing unit and staff verification.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated August 9, 2019.
It records an official inmate population count at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The total inmate count recorded was 758, later verified as 754.
The count is broken down by specific housing units within the facility (e.g., B-A, C-A, E-N, G-S, H-A, K-S, Z-A).
The document includes multiple official count slips requiring staff signatures, indicating standard prison administrative procedure.
